thread.title: Clips from the films leading the 2018 BAFTA nominations

title: Clips from the films leading the 2018 BAFTA nominations

organizations.name: british academy of film and television arts

text:
Clips from the films leading the 2018 BAFTA nominations 3:25pm GMT - 01:13 
Fantasy movie ''The Shape of Water'', with 12 nominations, leads the field ahead of the British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA) awards in February. Rough cut (no reporter narration)
